title: Broken Heart
summaries: The Broken Heart is a pet-summoning item that spawns a Cupid when used. It is found with an 8.33*1/12 (8.33%) chance when mining gems during Valentine's Day.
The Cupid will fly around the player and give off light. Unlike some other <linked>3DS</linked><linked>[img:Nintendo 3DS version]</linked>-exclusive pets, it does not attack <linked>enemies</linked>.
